caption.title: Predicted SHNP homology model.
caption.p: (A) SHNP representation as cartoon with predicted linear peptides spatial localization represented by colors where: red—SHNP (G72-D110); green—SHNP (P251-D264); yellow—SHNP (I266-A283). (B) SHNP electrostatic potential surface representing the positive (blue) and negative (red) charges of predicted protein. Peptides sticks representations of SHNP (G72-D110) (C), SHNP (P251-D264) (D), SHNP (I266-A283) (E) and their respective locations and electrostatic characteristics on the protein surface; SHNP (G72-D110) is in a more electronegative region whereas SHNP (P251-D264) and SHNP (I266-A283) are found in regions with more neutral features.
